issue.title: [CF 1031] Icons not being hidden when no buff active
issue.body:
IMPORTANT: If your issue is only occurring with a specific icon, include an export string of the icon in this ticket. Similarly, if the issue involves an entire group or an entire profile, include the entire export string of the group or profile.

To get an export string, open the icon editor, and click button labeled "Import/Export/Backup". Select the "To string" option for the appropriate export type for your issue, and then press CTRL+C to copy it to your clipboard.

What steps will reproduce the problem?
1. simply happens once i enter combat
2.
3.

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
icons usually stay hidden until the buff becomes active, have the icons to only show in combat, as well as have the absent box unchecked and only the present checkbox checked for all icons

What version of TellMeWhen are you using? ("The latest" is not a version)
occurs with the 7.2.1-7 version of 11/20

Do you have an error log of what happened?
1x Could not figure out how to inherit EventHandler_WhileConditions into class TellMeWhen.0x000000004778A3B0. Are you sure it exists?

the icons all work correctly, they show the cd and everything, they just no longer are hidden when the buff isn't present even though i have it to be hidden when there is no buff
